amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing funding for the relocation of the United States Embassy in Israel from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem.

vote.text: Amendment SA 552 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 552 proposed by Senator Rubio.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 552 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 552 proposed by Senator Rubio.
